column4: Feisty Fawn never finds the suspend info it wrote when it reboots, any ideas?
In other words, it suspends to disk, then when I reboot, it says swap is corrupted and tries to boot normally
Does anyone have Feisty installed and working suspend to disk?
umm i dont have feisty but, i would not trust suspending to disk..specially for a production system, for a toy..well maybe
